H0.text: What country has the largest Muslim population. Pakistan

H1.text: What country has the largest Muslim population. India

H2.text: What country has the largest Muslim population. Bangladesh

H3.text: What country has the largest Muslim population. INDONESIA

A4.text: Indonesia ranks fourth in the world by population and has the largest Muslim population of any country.

A5.text: As of 2023, 87.1% of the population (244 million Indonesians) are Muslims, making Indonesia the world's most populous Muslim-majority country.
